Package co.cask.coopr.http.handler

Http handlers.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AbstractAuthHandler Abstract handler that provides some base methods for authenticating and authorizing requests.
AdminHandler Handler for getting, adding, modifying, and deleting admin defined entities.
ClusterHandler Handler for performing cluster operations.
NodeHandler Handler for performing node operations.
PluginHandler Handler for plugin resource related operations, such as uploading resources, staging, and recalling resources, and syncing resources.
ProvisionerHandler Handles requests from provisioners to register themselves, send heartbeats, delete themselves, and get plugin resources.
RPCHandler Handler for RPCs.
StatusHandler Serves status URL.
SuperadminHandler Handler for performing tenant operations.
TaskHandler Handles requests to take and finish tasks from provisioners.
UserHandler Handler for managing users.
 

Package co.cask.coopr.http.handler Description

Http handlers.
